summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4021 for the improvement of 49th Avenue Northeast, from East 39th Street to East 38th Street; by constructing sewers and watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48699 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
